languages.text: "Я причащаюсь кодом Номос каждые пять циклов, и провожу в калькулос-медитации предписанное время. Но Омниссия пока не ниспослал мне ответ. Могу лишь сказать — возможности сущности Номос поразительны. Священные системы корабля поют под их прикосновением. Узлы, мертвые не первую сотню лет, оживают, истощенные механизмы получают новую жизнь". {n}В голосе Паскаля звучит благоговение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я причащаюсь кодом Номоса каждые пять циклов, и провожу в калькулос-медитации предписанное время. Но Омниссия пока не ниспослал мне ответ. Могу лишь сказать — возможности сущности Номос поразительны. Священные системы корабля поют под его прикосновением. Узлы, мертвые не первую сотню лет, оживают, истощенные механизмы получают новую жизнь". {n}В голосе Паскаля звучит благоговение.{/n}

languages.text: "Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of the entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я причащаюсь кодом Номос каждые пять циклов, и провожу в калькулос-медитации предписанное время. Но Омниссия пока не ниспослал мне ответ. Могу лишь сказать — возможности сущности Номос поразительны. Священные системы корабля поют под их прикосновением. Узлы, мертвые не первую сотню лет, оживают, истощенные механизмы получают новую жизнь". {n}В голосе Паскаля звучит благоговение.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Every five cycles, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of Entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

"Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. "Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of the entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

languages.text: « Tous les quinze quarts, je communie avec le code de Nomos et je passe le temps prescrit en méditation calculatoire. Toutefois, l'Omnimessie doit encore me bénir d'une réponse. Tout ce que je peux dire, c'est que les capacités de l'entité Nomos sont extraordinaires. Les systèmes sacrés de ce vaisseau chantent sous ses mains... Des dispositifs en panne depuis des centaines d'années standard redémarrent et des mécanismes inopérants depuis bien longtemps reprennent vie. » {n}Vous sentez de l'émerveillement dans les paroles de Pasqal.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of the entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Tous les cinq cycles, je communie avec le code de Nomos et je passe le temps prescrit en méditation calculatoire. Toutefois, l'Omnimessie doit encore me bénir d'une réponse. Tout ce que je peux dire, c'est que les capacités de l'entité Nomos sont extraordinaires. Les systèmes sacrés de ce vaisseau chantent sous ses mains... Des dispositifs en panne depuis des centaines d'années standard redémarrent et des mécanismes inopérants depuis bien longtemps reprennent vie. » {n}Vous sentez de l'émerveillement dans les paroles de Pasqal.{/n}

languages.text: “每隔十五巡，我就与诺莫斯的代码交流，花上规定的时间进行演算冥想。然而，欧姆尼塞亚还没有给予我答案。我唯一能确定的是，诺莫斯这个实体拥有非凡的能力。船上神圣的系统在它的触摸下歌唱，原本已经衰亡数百年的节点重新运转，长年萎靡的机制也焕发了活力。”{n}你从帕斯卡的声音中听到了敬畏之意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of the entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “每隔五个周期，我就与诺莫斯的代码交流，花上规定的时间进行演算冥想。然而，欧姆尼塞亚还没有给予我答案。我唯一能确定的是，实体诺莫斯拥有非凡的能力。船上神圣的系统在它的触摸下歌唱，原本已经衰亡数百年的节点重新运转，长年萎靡的机制也焕发了活力。”{n}你从帕斯卡的声音中听到了敬畏之意。{/n}

languages.text: "Alle fünfzehn Zyklen kommuniziere ich mit Nomos' Code und verbringe eine vorgeschriebene Zeit in der Calculus-Meditation. Doch der Omnissiah hat mich noch nicht mit einer Antwort gesegnet. Ich kann nur sagen, dass die Fähigkeiten der Wesenheit Nomos außergewöhnlich sind. Die heiligen Systeme des Schiffs singen unter ihrer Berührung. Knoten, die seit hunderten von Standardjahren tot waren, wurden wiederbelebt. Längst erschöpfte Mechanismen leben wieder." {n}Ein Anflug von Ehrfurcht liegt in Pasqals Stimme.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of the entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Alle fünf Zyklen kommuniziere ich mit Nomos' Code und verbringe eine vorgeschriebene Zeit in der Calculus-Meditation. Doch der Omnissiah hat mich noch nicht mit einer Antwort gesegnet. Ich kann nur sagen, dass die Fähigkeiten von Entität Nomos außergewöhnlich sind. Die heiligen Systeme des Schiffs singen unter ihrer Berührung. Knoten, die seit hunderten von Standardjahren tot waren, wurden wiederbelebt. Längst erschöpfte Mechanismen leben wieder." {n}Ein Anflug von Ehrfurcht liegt in Pasqals Stimme.{/n}

languages.text: «Cada cinco ciclos, comulgo con el código de Nomos y paso largos períodos de tiempo en meditación de cálculos. Pero el Omnissiah aún no me ha bendecido con una respuesta. Todo lo que puedo decir es que las capacidades de la entidad Nomos son extraordinarias. Los sistemas sagrados de la nave responden a su contacto de manera asombrosa. Los nodos que han permanecido inactivos durante cientos de años estándar se han reavivado, y los mecanismos que habían estado inactivos durante mucho tiempo vuelven a funcionar». {n}La voz de Pasqal denota cierto asombro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of the entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cada cinco ciclos, me comunico con el código de Nomos y paso largos períodos de tiempo en meditación de cálculos. Pero el Omnissiah aún no me ha bendecido con una respuesta. Todo lo que puedo decir es que las capacidades de la entidad Nomos son extraordinarias. Los sistemas sagrados de la nave responden a su contacto de manera asombrosa. Los nodos que han permanecido inactivos durante cientos de años estándar se han reavivado, y los mecanismos que habían estado inactivos durante mucho tiempo vuelven a funcionar. {n}La voz de Pasqal denota cierto asombro.{/n}

languages.text: 「自分は15周回ごとにノモスのコードと交信し、微積分の瞑想に所定の時間を費やしている。しかし、万機神はまだ答えをくださらない。ひとつだけ言えるのは、ノモスという存在の能力は並外れたものだということだ。この船の神聖なシステムがこの存在の内に宿っている。何百年もの間、停止したままノードがよみがえり、過去の遺物とみなされていたメカニズムが新たに動き出している」{n}パスカルの声には畏敬の念がこもっている。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of the entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「自分は15周回ごとにノモスのコードと交信し、微積分の瞑想に所定の時間を費やしている。しかし、万機神はまだ答えをくださらない。ひとつだけ言えるのは、ノモスという存在の能力は並外れたものだということだ。この船の神聖なシステムがこの存在の内に宿っている。何百年もの間、停止したままノードがよみがえり、過去の遺物とみなされていたメカニズムが新たに動き出している」{n}パスカルの声には畏敬の念がこもっている。{/n}

languages.text: "Her on beş nöbette bir Nomos'un koduyla irtibata geçip hesap meditasyonunda bir miktar zaman geçiriyorum. Lakin Hermesih, henüz bir cevap vahyetmedi. Elimden, Nomos adlı varlığın yeteneklerinin olağanüstü olduğunu söylemekten başka bir şey gelmiyor. Geminin kutsal sistemleri onun dokunuşuyla şakıyor, yüzlerce standart yıl boyu ölü kalmış düğümler canlanıyor ve nicedir bitkin mekanizmalar devinim kazanıyor." {n}Pasqal'ın sesindeki huşu hissiyatını duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Every fifteen watches, I commune with Nomos's code and spend prescribed lengths of time in calculus-meditation. However, the Omnissiah has yet to bless me with an answer. All I can say is that the capabilities of the entity Nomos are extraordinary. The ship's hallowed systems sing beneath its touch. Nodes that have remained dead for hundreds of standard years are revivified, and long-drained mechanisms live anew." {n}You hear notes of awe in Pasqal's voice.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Her on beş nöbette bir Nomos'un koduyla irtibata geçip hesap meditasyonu ile bir miktar zaman harcıyorum. Lakin Hermesih, henüz bir cevap vahyetmedi. Nomos adlı varlığın yeteneklerinin olağanüstü olduğunu söylemekten başka bir şey gelmiyor elimden. Geminin kutsal sistemleri onun dokunuşuyla şakıyor, yüzlerce standart yıl boyu ölü kalmış düğümler canlanıyor ve nicedir bitkin mekanizmalar devinim kazanıyor." {n}Pasqal'ın sesinde huşu dolu edalar duyuyorsun.{/n}
